name: guessmyanimal
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess my animal
des:
The skill will make you listen to the sound of an animal. You will be able to listen again if necessary. You can then request the answer. If you have a screen, the image of the animal will also appear on the screen when the skill provides the answer. You will then have the option to request to listen to other animals.
In the sound library, there are more than fifty animals present:
- domestic animals like a cow or a pig
- wild animals such as a lion or a hyena
- birds
- reptiles
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
